description:
Plogger is simple client for HP Palm webOS devices that allows you to access Blogger on-the-go.  It currently supports creating and editing posts in both 'compose' and 'HTML' modes, publishing posts, and saving posts as drafts.  Future versions will include support for setting post categories, deleting posts, and more.

A Blogger, BlogSpot, or Google account is required to use Plogger.

Update 1.2:  Fixed memory leak.  Displays spinner while posting/saving since this can take a while over cellular data networks.  Doesn't display post/save reminder when closing an unedited post.
Update 1.1:  Adds HTML editing.
versionNote: Fixed memory leak.  Displays spinner while posting/saving since this can take a while over cellular data networks.  Doesn't display post/save reminder when closing an unedited post.
